column5: @BinderMaterial describes the required material to be used for the binder cover.
@RingShape specifies the shape of the ring binder rings.

@RivetsExposed describes the ring mechanism mounting in a binder case. If "true", the heads of the rivets are visible on the exterior of the binder. If "false", the binder covering material covers the rivet heads.
@ViewBinder specifies the details of clear vinyl outer-wrap types on top of a colored base wrap.
